com.example.myurbanflix

Class PreferencesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.myurbanflix.PreferencesHelper

  • public class PreferencesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Acts as a helper (an interface) for other activities to use in order to access shared preferences Contains several overloaded methods for getting and setting particular preferences based on the type of the parameters given

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PreferencesHelper()
      Instantiates a SharedPreferences helper based on the Context of the MainActivity.
      PreferencesHelper(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String preferences)
      Instantiates a SharedPreferences helper based on /any/ context and name (for unit testing)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getPreference(java.lang.String id, boolean defaultValue)
      Allows client to access shared preference bool field by key, returning a default value if preference is not found
      int getPreference(java.lang.String id, int defaultValue)
      Allows client to access shared preference integer field by key, returning a default value if preference is not found
      java.lang.String getPreference(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String defaultValue)
      Allows client to access shared preference string field by key, returning a default value if preference is not found
      void removePreference(java.lang.String id)
      Removes a preferences from shared preferences by key
      void setPreference(java.lang.String id, boolean value)
      Adds or edits a boolean to shared preferences
      void setPreference(java.lang.String id, int value)
      Adds or edits an integer to shared preferences
      void setPreference(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String value)
      Adds or edits a String to shared preferences

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PreferencesHelper

        public PreferencesHelper()
        Instantiates a SharedPreferences helper based on the Context of the MainActivity.

      • PreferencesHelper

        public PreferencesHelper(android.content.Context context,
                         java.lang.String preferences)
        Instantiates a SharedPreferences helper based on /any/ context and name (for unit testing)
        Parameters:
        context - - context of activity to populate preferences from
        preferences - - name of shared preferences file to draw from

    • Method Detail

      • getPreference

        public java.lang.String getPreference(java.lang.String id,
                                      java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Allows client to access shared preference string field by key, returning a default value if preference is not found
        Parameters:
        id - - preference key to search
        defaultValue - - default value to return if key is not found
        Returns:
        either the preference value if found, or the default value otherwise

      • getPreference

        public boolean getPreference(java.lang.String id,
                             boolean defaultValue)
        Allows client to access shared preference bool field by key, returning a default value if preference is not found
        Parameters:
        id - - preference key to search
        defaultValue - - default value to return if key is not found
        Returns:
        either the preference value if found, or the default value otherwise

        Parameters:
        id - - preference key to search
        defaultValue - - default value to return if key is not found
        Returns:
        either the preference value if found, or the default value otherwise

        public void setPreference(java.lang.String id,
                          boolean value)
        Adds or edits a boolean to shared preferences
        Parameters:
        id - - key of preference to mutate
        value - - value of preference
